description: This data set includes all public meetings that were posted to the Transparency website by State of Oregon agencies, boards, commissions and ESD's from January 1. 2014 through December 31, 2014. The meetings are sorted by date.

metadata.description: This data set includes all public meetings that were posted to the Transparency website by State of Oregon agencies, boards, commissions and ESD's from January 1. 2014 through December 31, 2014. The meetings are sorted by date.

name: Archived 2014 Oregon Public Meetings 1
